lolwut
Class Penguin

java.lang.Object
  lolwut.PhysicalObject
      lolwut.Penguin

public class Penguin
extends PhysicalObject

The class that represents the player. The Penguin can switch between Penguin and Bunny (powered up) modes.

Author:
Anran Li

Constructor Detail

Penguin

public Penguin(double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height,
               java.lang.String imagePath)
Constructs an Penguin with the given parameters.

Parameters:
x - The x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the Penguin
y - The y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the Penguin
width - The width of the Penguin
height - The height of the Penguin
imagePath - The path to the image of the Penguin

Returns:
true if the penguin is powered up, false otherwise

damage

public void damage()
Does damage to the penguin. Kills the penguin if not powered up, or depowers the penguin if powered up as bunny.

powerUp

public void powerUp()
Powers up the penguin into bunny mode.
